name: Medical Shop: Cash Register Drug Store
name_original: Medical Shop: Cash Register Drug Store
description:
Medical Shop Cash Register Drug Store

Hey Guys! We have come up with a medical shop game. So are you ready to handle the drug store? 
In this game, you need to maintain a medical shop. Give the required medicines to the patients and take the cash from them.
There will be a number of medicines for different illnesses and the affected body parts. Give patients the exact prescribed medicine, 
get more coins by upgrading the medicine's quality and unlock all the medicines. So do play this addictive drugstore game and don't forget to share with
your friends and family.

Key Features:

So many different medicines to cure the patients

You need to achieve the target on every level

Daily rewards and daily challenges will be there to surprise you

Number of power-ups to boost up your gameplay experience

Unlock & Upgrade all the medicine to explore more

Achievements will be there to get you engaged
